string.text: Sandbox+ is an enhanced version of Sandbox in Bannerlord. This game mode builds on the traditional Sandbox experience by introducing more randomized elements. While both Sandbox and Campaign always start on the same date with the same clans, factions, and static borders, Sandbox+ offers a dynamic twist. Each time you play, you have the opportunity to encounter entirely different clans, borders, and even kingdoms, all without disrupting the existing systems or diminishing the overall experience. Sandbox+ maintains the familiar gameplay mechanics of Sandbox but ensures a unique adventure for every player in each session.
